item.title: Best size? + mkdir();
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

well i have a huge screen on my pc so my res aint normal so i just wanted to know what is the best size for a photoshop image map site? in px i guess that is it i just got bored again lol so im doing something new trying to improve my graphics at the same time never made a site 100% out of image maps should be fun

i just need the image size in with and hight (px) and ill just ad on hight as i need it

thanks [br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 05:58:13 AM[/size][hr]and also something that has been pissing me off in vista i think its because you cant make a file with out that shit asking you if you realy want to but eh im making a directory with php but it don’t show up dose it show up with you?

[php]
mkdir("/filename",0755);

// or if its a windows pc

mkdir("\filename",0755);
[/php]

just me fucking things up or?
